name: The Music Room
description: The Music Room is an award nominated expressive MIDI controller. It combines virtual reality instruments and inspiring spaces. Unlike keyboard MIDI controllers, The Music Room allows you to strum, slide, bend and drum naturally and expressively.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64bit Processor: Intel i5-4590 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1000 MB available space Sound Card: ASIO recommended Additional Notes: HTC Vive / Steam VR required
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8.1 64bit Processor: Intel i7 Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 980 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1000 MB available space Sound Card: ASIO recommended, RME or similar. Additional Notes: HTC Vive / Steam VR required
